green-feelings.text: Go quiet and remove myself from the situation
Just want to be alone with my thoughts
Tend to reflect and keep my thoughts to myself
Want someone I can talk the problem through with
Am willing to ask for help
Need to vent my frustrations with someone and free myself

red-frustration.text: Tend to speak first and think later
Can be direct and insensitive to others feelings
May say things in the heat of the moment and regret them later.
Want to solve the problem I'm facing
Want to take quick action to fix things
Have a need to do something now to improve the situation

purple-focus.text: Imagine problems to be bigger and worse in my mind
Can feel low and depreesed for a while
Have a tendency to think of worst-case scenario
Can find it hard to concentarte
Can find it hard to stick with one task and give it my full attention
Can't make my mind up and will keep delaying a challenging task

blue-fault.text: Have a tendency to blame myself
Belive I could have done things better
Can point the finger at others
Think others have let me down
